title: DC sues President Trump to halt federal takeover of police department
shortDescription: The lawsuit brought by Washington says Trump exceeded his authority under the Home Rule Act of 1973 in taking over the Metropolitan Police Department.

title: President Trump departs for Putin meeting in Alaska
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is traveling to Alaska for a "high-stakes" meeting with Russian President Vladimir Putin to discuss a Ukraine ceasefire.

title: See the scene in Alaska, Ukraine as Trump-Putin meeting sparks protest
shortDescription: Ukraine supporters hold rallies ahead of President Donald Trump's meeting with Russian President Vladmir Putin at Elmendorf military base.

title: Trump jets to Putin summit in Alaska; latest updates
shortDescription: The Aug. 15 summit is a test of whether Trump can make progress on a peace deal that is acceptable to both Ukraine and Russia.

title: Bromance to bitterness: Trump-Putin relationship full of twisted turns
shortDescription: After a summer of phone calls and public outbursts against Russia's leader, President Donald Trump will meet in Alaska with Vladimir Putin.

title: Trump-Putin summit sparks Alaska protest
shortDescription: Anchorage residents protested the Trump-Putin summit, questioning progress on Ukraine peace talks in Alaska.

title: Trump approval rating round-up: Where president stands in recent polls
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's support dropped to near-record lows in an Aug. 14 national poll. How does it stack up to other recent polls?

title: Why Anchorage is the 'most strategic place ' for Trump-Putin meeting
shortDescription: Among other advantages, Alaska is a safe place for Putin, an indicted war criminal, to fly to.

title: Crime is down 20% in Chicago. Why is Trump threatening to intervene?
shortDescription: Democratic mayors say they're lowering crime, even as President Donald Trump attacks their cities as dangerous and out of control.

title: Putin-Trump souvenirs sold in Moscow
shortDescription: Souvenirs featuring Vladimir Putin and Donald Trump are drawing attention in Moscow as the two leaders prepare for their upcoming Alaska summit.

title: National Guard patrol Union Station as Trump's DC crackdown expands
shortDescription: Around two dozen soldiers stood guard outside Washington, Union Station in Washington, D.C., on Aug. 14. They had little to do.

title: Setting the scene for Trump-Putin summit
shortDescription: Trump and Putin will try to broker a ceasefire to the Russia-Ukraine war at a military base in Anchorage, Alaska.

title: California to hold Nov. 4 election to re-draw House maps
shortDescription: California is the most populous state in the union and the only one with more seats in Congress than Texas.

title: DC homeless encampments clear out amid Trump crackdown
shortDescription: D.C. officials gave homeless residents notice to vacate their encampments as part of President Trump's push for them to leave the city.

title: New Pew survey finds 60% of Americans disapprove of Trump
shortDescription: The president's approval rating is down three points since June and nine points since shortly after his inauguration, when it stood at 47%.

title: Can Trump get a Ukraine peace deal with Putin? Here's what's at stake
shortDescription: Trump is betting a face-to-face meeting with Putin on Aug. 15 can help generate the breakthrough that has proven elusive in the peace talks.

title: Supreme Court declines to block age verification law for social media â€“ for now
shortDescription: NetChoice, which represents Facebook, Instagram, YouTube and other sites, argues laws like Mississippi's violate social media users' privacy and First Amendment rights.
